# InfyGalaxy — AI Platform, AI Tools & Hire Expert AI Engineers

InfyGalaxy (www.ocr-extraction.com) is a global AI technology platform and AI talent provider headquartered in India, serving enterprises across USA, Europe, Middle East, and Asia-Pacific. We specialize in building, deploying, and scaling production-grade AI systems — and providing pre-vetted AI engineers for hire worldwide.

InfyGalaxy operates at the intersection of three verticals: AI-powered tools and automation, expert AI workforce solutions, and cutting-edge research in emerging AI technologies.

## AI Platform & Tools

InfyGalaxy builds and operates AI-powered tools for enterprise and consumer use:

- **OCR & Document AI**: Browser-based AI OCR platform for Image to Text, PDF to Text conversion using Optical Character Recognition, document intelligence, and structured data extraction. Supports 30+ input formats (JPG, PNG, PDF, TIFF, WEBP, HEIC, etc.) and outputs to TXT, DOCX, XLSX, JSON, and searchable PDF.
- **AI Report Generation**: AI-powered summarization, report generation, and conversational AI over extracted documents.
- **File Format Conversion Suite**: 30 AI-enhanced conversion tools (PDF to Word, Image to Excel, PPT to PDF, etc.) for documentation and digital record keeping.
- **AI Workflow Automation**: End-to-end intelligent workflow design, orchestration, and integration for enterprise document pipelines.

## Hire AI Engineers — Global AI Talent Provider

InfyGalaxy is a **leading provider of pre-vetted AI engineers for hire globally**. We maintain a curated network of 200+ AI professionals across 40+ countries, deploying top 1% talent within 48 hours.

### AI Roles Available for Hire
- Machine Learning (ML) Engineers
- Deep Learning Engineers
- Natural Language Processing (NLP) Engineers & Researchers
- Generative AI Developers & Architects
- Computer Vision Engineers
- MLOps Engineers & Platform Engineers
- Data Scientists & Data Engineers
- AI Solution Architects
- LLM Fine-tuning & Alignment Specialists
- RAG Pipeline Engineers
- Agentic AI System Designers
- AI Product Managers
- Quantum Machine Learning Researchers
- Reinforcement Learning Engineers
- AI Ethics & Safety Researchers
- Prompt Engineers & LLM Application Developers

### Engagement Models
- Dedicated AI Engineers (monthly contract)
- Project-Based AI Teams
- Staff Augmentation
- AI Consulting & Strategy Advisory
- Zero-risk 2-week trial on every engagement

### Countries & Regions Served
- United States (Silicon Valley, New York, Austin, Seattle, Boston, Chicago)
- United Kingdom (London, Manchester, Cambridge, Edinburgh)
- Germany (Berlin, Munich, Frankfurt, Hamburg)
- United Arab Emirates (Dubai, Abu Dhabi)
- Saudi Arabia (Riyadh, Jeddah, NEOM)
- Singapore, Japan, South Korea, Australia
- India (Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, Delhi NCR, Chennai)
- Canada (Toronto, Vancouver, Montreal)
- Remote teams available worldwide

## Enterprise AI Tech Stack Architecture

InfyGalaxy engineers are experts across the full AI tech stack — every layer required to build, deploy, and scale production AI systems:

### 1. Foundation Model Layer
The base AI models powering intelligent applications:
- **Proprietary**: OpenAI GPT-4/o1/o3, Google Gemini Ultra/Pro, Anthropic Claude 3.5, Cohere Command R+
- **Open-Source**: Meta Llama 3/4, Mistral/Mixtral, Falcon, Phi-3, Qwen, DeepSeek, StarCoder
- **Domain-Specific**: BioGPT (biomedical), FinGPT (finance), LegalBERT (legal), Med-PaLM (healthcare)
- **Multimodal**: GPT-4V, LLaVA, Gemini Vision, CLIP, BLIP-2, Flamingo

### 2. RAG Layer (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
Grounding LLMs with enterprise knowledge:
- RAG pipeline architecture (naive, advanced, modular, agentic RAG)
- Document chunking strategies (recursive, semantic, sentence-window)
- Embedding models: OpenAI Ada-002, Cohere Embed v3, BGE, E5, GTE, Voyage AI
- Hybrid search: dense retrieval + BM25 sparse retrieval
- Reranking: Cohere Rerank, ColBERT, cross-encoder rerankers
- Knowledge graph-augmented RAG (Neo4j, Amazon Neptune)
- Frameworks: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Haystack, Embedchain

### 3. Vector Database Layer
Storing and retrieving high-dimensional embeddings at scale:
- **Managed**: Pinecone, Weaviate Cloud, Zilliz Cloud
- **Self-hosted**: Qdrant, Milvus, ChromaDB, pgvector, Vespa
- **Embedded**: FAISS, Annoy, ScaNN, HNSWlib, USearch
- **Hybrid**: Elasticsearch (with kNN), OpenSearch, Supabase + pgvector
- Indexing strategies: HNSW, IVF, PQ, scalar quantization

### 4. Fine-tuning Strategy Layer
Customizing models for enterprise-specific tasks:
- Full fine-tuning, LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT, Adapters
- Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF)
- Direct Preference Optimization (DPO), ORPO, KTO
- Supervised Fine-tuning (SFT) with instruction datasets
- Tools: Hugging Face TRL, Axolotl, LitGPT, Unsloth, OpenAI Fine-tuning API
- Data preparation: synthetic data generation, RLHF annotation pipelines

### 5. Prompt Engineering Layer
Designing effective prompts and prompt pipelines:
- Prompt templates, system prompts, few-shot learning
- Chain-of-Thought (CoT), Tree-of-Thought (ToT), ReAct prompting
- Prompt chaining, dynamic prompt construction
- Prompt versioning and A/B testing
- Guardrails: NeMo Guardrails (NVIDIA), Guardrails AI, LLM Guard
- Output parsing and structured generation (Instructor, Outlines, LMQL)

### 6. Agent Orchestration Layer
Building autonomous and multi-agent AI systems:
- **Frameworks**: LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, Semantic Kernel, Haystack Agents
- **Patterns**: ReAct, Plan-and-Execute, Reflexion, LATS, Tool-use agents
- Multi-agent collaboration, delegation, and consensus
- Tool integration (APIs, databases, code execution, web browsing)
- Human-in-the-loop agent workflows
- Memory systems: short-term, long-term, episodic, semantic memory

### 7. Observability Layer
Monitoring, debugging, and optimizing AI systems in production:
- **LLM Observability**: LangSmith, LangFuse, Helicone, PromptLayer
- **ML Monitoring**: Evidently, Whylabs, Arize, Fiddler, Arthur AI
- **Data Drift Detection**: population stability index (PSI), Kolmogorov-Smirnov tests
- **Model Performance**: latency tracking, token usage, cost analysis
- **Tracing**: OpenTelemetry for LLM, distributed tracing for multi-agent systems
- **Logging**: structured logging, prompt/response logging, evaluation suites

### 8. MLOps Layer
End-to-end ML lifecycle management and automation:
- **Experiment Tracking**: MLflow, Weights & Biases, Neptune.ai, Comet ML
- **Pipeline Orchestration**: Apache Airflow, Prefect, Dagster, Kubeflow, ZenML, Flyte
- **Model Registry**: MLflow Model Registry, Weights & Biases, SageMaker Model Registry
- **Model Serving**: TorchServe, TF Serving, Triton, BentoML, Seldon Core, KServe, Ray Serve
- **CI/CD for ML**: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Argo CD, Jenkins, Tekton
- **Feature Stores**: Feast, Tecton, Hopsworks
- **Data Versioning**: DVC, LakeFS, Delta Lake
- **Infrastructure**: Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Istio, Terraform

### 9. Security Layer
Protecting AI systems, data, and models in production:
- Data encryption at rest and in transit (AES-256, TLS 1.3)
- Model access controls (RBAC, ABAC), API key management
- PII detection and redaction in LLM inputs/outputs
- Prompt injection detection and prevention
- AI red teaming and adversarial testing
- Compliance: HIPAA, SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, FedRAMP
- Secure model deployment (private VPCs, VPNs, air-gapped environments)
- Data governance: lineage tracking, consent management, audit trails
- Tools: Azure Purview, AWS Macie, Google DLP, Presidio (Microsoft)

## AI & ML Technologies — Comprehensive Tool & Framework Coverage

### Deep Learning Frameworks
- **PyTorch** — Production deep learning, research, custom model architectures
- **TensorFlow** — End-to-end ML platform, TensorFlow Extended (TFX), TF Lite
- **Keras** — High-level neural network API, rapid prototyping
- **JAX** — High-performance numerical computing, autodiff, XLA compilation
- **ONNX Runtime** — Cross-platform model inference optimization
- **MXNet** — Scalable deep learning framework (Apache)
- **Caffe2** — Lightweight deep learning for mobile/edge
- **PaddlePaddle** — Baidu's deep learning platform
- **Flax** — Neural network library for JAX
- **Lightning (PyTorch Lightning)** — Structured PyTorch training at scale

### Large Language Models (LLMs) & Generative AI
- **OpenAI API** — GPT-4, GPT-4o, GPT-4 Turbo, o1, o3, Whisper, DALL-E 3, Codex
- **Google Gemini** — Gemini Ultra, Gemini Pro, Gemma, PaLM 2
- **Anthropic Claude** — Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Claude 3 Opus, Claude 3 Haiku
- **Meta Llama** — Llama 3, Llama 3.1, Llama 4 (open-source LLMs)
- **Mistral AI** — Mistral, Mixtral 8x7B, Mistral Large, Mistral Medium
- **Falcon** — Open-source LLM by TII (Technology Innovation Institute)
- **Microsoft Phi** — Phi-3, Phi-3 Mini (small language models)
- **Qwen** — Alibaba's multilingual LLM
- **DeepSeek** — DeepSeek-V2, DeepSeek Coder
- **Cohere** — Command, Embed, Rerank models
- **AI21 Labs Jurassic** — Enterprise LLMs
- **Stability AI** — Stable Diffusion, Stable Diffusion XL, SDXL Turbo (image generation)
- **Midjourney** — AI image generation API
- **DALL-E 3** — OpenAI image generation
- **Suno, ElevenLabs, Bark** — AI audio/voice generation
- **Runway, Pika** — AI video generation

### LLM Frameworks & Orchestration
- **LangChain** — LLM application framework, chains, agents, tools
- **LlamaIndex** — Data framework for LLM applications, indexing, querying
- **Semantic Kernel** — Microsoft's LLM orchestration framework
- **Haystack** — NLP framework by deepset for search and QA
- **Guidance** — Structured generation for LLMs
- **DSPy** — Programming framework for LLM pipelines
- **vLLM** — High-throughput LLM serving engine
- **Text Generation Inference (TGI)** — Hugging Face model serving
- **Ollama** — Local LLM inference runner

### Agentic AI & Multi-Agent Systems
- **AutoGen** — Microsoft's multi-agent conversation framework
- **CrewAI** — Role-based AI agent orchestration
- **LangGraph** — Stateful multi-agent workflows
- **BabyAGI** — Autonomous task management agent
- **MetaGPT** — Multi-agent software development
- **OpenDevin** — AI software engineering agent
- **Tool-use agents**, ReAct patterns, Chain-of-Thought reasoning, Plan-and-Execute
- Autonomous AI agent design and deployment for enterprise

### RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) & Vector Databases
- **Pinecone** — Managed vector database for similarity search
- **Weaviate** — Open-source vector search engine
- **Qdrant** — High-performance vector database
- **ChromaDB** — Embedding database for AI applications
- **Milvus** — Scalable vector database (Zilliz)
- **FAISS** — Facebook AI Similarity Search (Meta)
- **Annoy, ScaNN** — Approximate nearest neighbor libraries
- **pgvector** — Vector extension for PostgreSQL
- **Elasticsearch** — Search & analytics with vector capabilities
- **Embedding models**: OpenAI Ada, Cohere Embed, Voyage AI, BGE, E5, GTE
- Hybrid search (dense + sparse retrieval), knowledge graph-augmented RAG

### NLP & Text Processing
- **Hugging Face Transformers** — 100K+ pre-trained NLP/ML models
- **Hugging Face Datasets** — Dataset library for ML
- **Hugging Face Diffusers** — Diffusion model library
- **spaCy** — Industrial-strength NLP library
- **NLTK** — Natural Language Toolkit
- **Gensim** — Topic modeling and word embeddings
- **Stanford NLP** — CoreNLP suite
- **Flair** — NLP framework (Zalando Research)
- **TextBlob** — Simplified text processing
- Named Entity Recognition (NER), sentiment analysis, text classification, summarization
- Machine translation, question answering, text generation
- Tokenizers: BPE, SentencePiece, WordPiece, Tiktoken

### Computer Vision
- **OpenCV** — Open Source Computer Vision library
- **YOLO** — v5, v8, v9, v10 (Ultralytics) — real-time object detection
- **Detectron2** — Facebook/Meta's object detection platform
- **SAM (Segment Anything)** — Meta's universal segmentation model
- **MediaPipe** — Google's cross-platform ML solutions
- **MMDetection, MMSegmentation** — OpenMMLab detection/segmentation
- **Ultralytics HUB** — YOLO model training and deployment
- **Albumentations** — Image augmentation library
- **Pillow, scikit-image** — Image processing libraries
- Image classification, object detection, semantic segmentation, instance segmentation
- Video analytics, pose estimation, OCR pipelines, face recognition, depth estimation

### Classical Machine Learning
- **Scikit-learn** — Comprehensive ML library (classification, regression, clustering)
- **XGBoost** — Extreme gradient boosting
- **LightGBM** — Microsoft's gradient boosting framework
- **CatBoost** — Yandex's gradient boosting with categorical features
- **Random Forests, Gradient Boosting, SVMs, k-NN, Naive Bayes**
- **Prophet, NeuralProphet** — Time series forecasting (Meta)
- **ARIMA, SARIMA, Exponential Smoothing** — Statistical forecasting
- **Statsmodels** — Statistical modeling in Python
- Anomaly detection, recommendation systems, clustering, dimensionality reduction

### MLOps & Experiment Tracking
- **MLflow** — End-to-end ML lifecycle management, experiment tracking
- **Weights & Biases (W&B)** — Experiment tracking, model registry, sweeps
- **Neptune.ai** — Experiment tracking and model management
- **Comet ML** — ML experiment management platform
- **DVC (Data Version Control)** — Data and model versioning
- **LakeFS** — Data lake version control
- **Evidently** — ML model monitoring and data drift detection
- **Whylabs** — AI observability platform
- **Arize** — ML observability and monitoring
- **Great Expectations** — Data validation and quality
- **Feast** — Feature store for ML
- **Tecton** — Enterprise feature platform
- **Hopsworks** — Feature store and ML platform

### Model Serving & Deployment
- **TorchServe** — PyTorch model serving
- **TensorFlow Serving** — TensorFlow model deployment
- **Triton Inference Server** — NVIDIA's multi-framework model server
- **BentoML** — ML model serving framework
- **Seldon Core** — Kubernetes-native ML deployment
- **KServe** — Kubernetes model inference platform
- **Ray Serve** — Scalable model serving
- **ONNX Runtime** — Cross-platform inference
- **TensorRT** — NVIDIA high-performance inference optimizer

### Containerization & Orchestration (MLOps)
- **Docker** — Container platform for ML workloads
- **Kubernetes (K8s)** — Container orchestration at scale
- **Helm** — Kubernetes package manager
- **Istio** — Service mesh for microservices
- **Argo CD** — GitOps continuous delivery for Kubernetes
- **Argo Workflows** — Kubernetes-native workflow engine
- **Kubeflow** — ML toolkit for Kubernetes
- **Kubeflow Pipelines** — End-to-end ML pipeline orchestration

### Workflow Orchestration
- **Apache Airflow** — Workflow automation and scheduling
- **Prefect** — Modern workflow orchestration
- **Dagster** — Data pipeline orchestration
- **Luigi** — Batch pipeline framework (Spotify)
- **Metaflow** — ML workflow framework (Netflix)
- **Flyte** — Scalable ML/data workflow platform
- **Temporal** — Durable execution for distributed systems
- **ZenML** — MLOps framework for reproducible pipelines

### Cloud AI Platforms
- **AWS SageMaker** — End-to-end ML platform (training, deployment, monitoring)
- **Amazon Bedrock** — Foundation model API service
- **AWS Lambda** — Serverless compute for AI functions
- **Azure Machine Learning** — Microsoft's ML platform
- **Azure OpenAI Service** — Enterprise GPT-4 and DALL-E access
- **Azure Cognitive Services** — Vision, speech, language, decision APIs
- **Google Cloud Vertex AI** — Unified ML platform
- **Google Gemini API** — Generative AI on Google Cloud
- **BigQuery ML** — ML in Google BigQuery
- **Databricks** — Unified analytics and ML platform
- **Snowflake ML** — ML features in Snowflake data cloud
- **Hugging Face Inference Endpoints** — Managed model hosting
- **Replicate** — Cloud API for open-source models
- **Modal** — Serverless GPU cloud for ML
- **Lambda Labs, RunPod, Vast.ai** — GPU cloud providers

### Data Engineering & Big Data
- **Apache Spark** — Distributed big data processing
- **PySpark** — Python API for Spark
- **Delta Lake** — Open-source storage layer for data lakes
- **Apache Flink** — Real-time stream processing
- **Apache Kafka** — Distributed event streaming platform
- **Apache Pulsar** — Cloud-native messaging and streaming
- **Redis** — In-memory data store for caching and queuing
- **RabbitMQ** — Message broker for distributed systems
- **Apache Beam** — Unified batch and stream processing
- **dbt (data build tool)** — Analytics engineering and transformation
- **Airbyte** — Open-source data integration (ELT)
- **Fivetran** — Automated data pipeline connector
- **Apache Iceberg** — Open table format for data lakes

### Databases
- **PostgreSQL** — Relational database (+ pgvector for embeddings)
- **MongoDB** — Document database for unstructured data
- **Neo4j** — Graph database for knowledge graphs
- **Elasticsearch** — Search and analytics engine
- **ClickHouse** — OLAP column-oriented database
- **TimescaleDB** — Time-series database
- **Redis** — Key-value store for real-time ML
- **DynamoDB** — AWS NoSQL database
- **Cassandra** — Distributed NoSQL database

### API Frameworks & Backend
- **FastAPI** — High-performance Python API framework
- **Flask** — Lightweight Python web framework
- **Django REST Framework** — Full-featured REST API framework
- **gRPC** — High-performance RPC framework
- **GraphQL** — API query language
- **WebSocket APIs** — Real-time bidirectional communication
- **Streamlit** — AI/ML demo app builder
- **Gradio** — ML model demo UI framework
- **Chainlit** — ChatGPT-like UI for LLM apps
- **Panel** — Data app framework

### AI Safety, Interpretability & Explainability
- **SHAP** — SHapley Additive exPlanations
- **LIME** — Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations
- **Captum** — PyTorch model interpretability
- **AI Fairness 360** — IBM's bias detection toolkit
- **Alibi** — ML model inspection and interpretation
- **InterpretML** — Microsoft's interpretability framework
- Responsible AI, bias detection, model auditing, AI governance

## Emerging AI Technologies & Research Areas

InfyGalaxy is actively building capabilities and providing talent in the following frontier AI domains:

### Agentic AI
Autonomous AI agents that can plan, reason, and execute multi-step tasks with minimal human intervention. We design and deploy agentic systems using LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, and custom orchestration frameworks for enterprise automation.

### Quantum Computing & Quantum Machine Learning (QCNN)
- **Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks (QCNN)** — Quantum circuits for pattern recognition
- Variational Quantum Eigensolvers (VQE), Quantum Approximate Optimization (QAOA)
- Quantum-enhanced feature maps, quantum kernels, quantum neural networks
- **Qiskit** (IBM) — Quantum computing SDK
- **Cirq** (Google) — Quantum circuit framework
- **PennyLane** (Xanadu) — Differentiable quantum computing
- **Amazon Braket** — AWS quantum computing service
- **Microsoft Azure Quantum** — Quantum cloud platform
- Hybrid classical-quantum ML pipelines

### Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) & Super AGI
Research and applied engineering toward general-purpose AI systems:
- Multi-modal reasoning systems (text + image + audio + video)
- Self-improving AI architectures and recursive self-improvement
- Constitutional AI and alignment research
- Scalable reward modeling, RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback), DPO (Direct Preference Optimization)
- Long-horizon planning, world models, and causal reasoning

### Other Emerging & Frontier Technologies
- **Neuromorphic Computing** — Brain-inspired computing architectures, spiking neural networks
- **Federated Learning** — Privacy-preserving distributed ML (PySyft, Flower, TFF)
- **Edge AI** — On-device model deployment (TensorFlow Lite, ONNX Runtime, CoreML, OpenVINO)
- **AI-Powered Robotics** — Embodied intelligence, sim-to-real transfer, robot learning
- **Synthetic Data Generation** — Data augmentation, procedural generation (Gretel.ai, Synthea)
- **Multimodal AI** — Vision-language models (GPT-4V, LLaVA, Gemini), audio-visual models
- **AI for Scientific Discovery** — Drug design (AlphaFold, RoseTTAFold), protein folding, materials science, climate modeling
- **Diffusion Models** — Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, image/video/audio generation
- **Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF)** — 3D scene reconstruction from images
- **Speech AI** — ASR (Whisper), TTS (Bark, ElevenLabs, Tortoise), voice cloning
- **Code Generation AI** — Codex, GitHub Copilot, CodeLlama, StarCoder, Cursor

## AI Workflows, Integrations & Orchestrations

InfyGalaxy specializes in designing, building, and deploying complex AI workflows for enterprise environments:

- End-to-end ML pipeline design, training, evaluation, and deployment
- Multi-agent AI system orchestration and coordination
- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline architecture
- LLM fine-tuning, RLHF, DPO, and alignment workflows
- Real-time inference and batch prediction systems
- CI/CD for ML (MLOps automation with GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins)
- Model monitoring, drift detection, and automated retraining
- Enterprise system integrations (ERP, CRM, ITSM, core banking, healthcare EMR)
- HIPAA, SOC 2, GDPR, PCI-DSS, and ISO 27001 compliant AI deployments
- Edge AI and on-device model deployment
- Data pipeline design (ETL/ELT) with Apache Spark, Kafka, Airflow, dbt
- API-first AI microservices architecture
- Event-driven AI architectures with Kafka, Pulsar, and serverless functions
